titleInfo.title: USA v. Mendoza-Mesa, et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER - Resentencing of the defendant is scheduled before the undersigned onDecember 15, 2005, at 11:00 a.m., Courtroom No. 3, Roman L. Hruska U.S. Courthouse, 111 South 18th Plaza, Omaha, Nebraska. The defendant must be present for this hearing. The U.S. Marshal's Office is directed to return the defendant to this district for the above hearing. Susan M. Bazis is appointed as counsel for the defendant, pursuant to the Criminal Justice Act, for this resentencing. The Federal Public Defender shall provide CJA counsel with a new voucher as to defendant Ramon Mendoza-Mesa. Signed by Judge Joseph F. Bataillon on 10/14/2005. (TJS)

Hruska U.S. Courthouse, 111 South 18th Plaza, Omaha, Nebraska. The defendant must be present for this hearing. The U.S. Marshal's Office is directed to return the defendant to this district for the above hearing. Susan M. Bazis is appointed as counsel for the defendant, pursuant to the Criminal Justice Act, for this resentencing. The Federal Public Defender shall provide CJA counsel with a new voucher as to defendant Ramon Mendoza-Mesa. Signed by Judge Joseph F. Bataillon on 10/14/2005. (TJS)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Mendoza-Mesa, et al
titleInfo.subTitle: AMENDED JUDGMENT (Reduction of Sentence) as to Ramon Mendoza-Mesa (1), Count(s) 1, Defendant pleaded guilty to count I and sentenced to seventy (70) months Bureau of Prisons followed by five (5) years of supervised release; the special assessment in the amount of $100.00 has been paid in full; Jgm of aquittal was entered as to counts II and III of the Indictment and dft is discharged as to these counts; defendant remanded to the custody of the US Marshal as to defendant(s) Ramon Mendoza-Mesa. Signed by Judge Joseph F. Bataillon on 1/10/2006. 4 certified copies to USM (PCV, ) Modified on 1/11/2006 to reflect that defendant entered a guilty plea to count I (PCV, ).

Signed by Judge Joseph F. Bataillon on 1/10/2006. 4 certified copies to USM (PCV, ) Modified on 1/11/2006 to reflect that defendant entered a guilty plea to count I (PCV, ).
